data.name: Top Down Zombies
data.detailed_description:
A fast-paced and intense top-down shooter, TDZ will have you sweating in no time.

Dash, sprint, and blast away endless hoards of Reddz - stay on your toes and lookout for your next loadout upgrade. Buy better weapons with the money earned from fallen Reddz, or open new areas of the map to explore - it's up to you.

Becoming increasingly faster and more powerful each round, the Reddz will easily overcome a player without sharp reflexes, a quick trigger finger, and/or some massive fire power.

Stand off against the Redd army by yourself or with up to 3 friends in local multiplayer split-screen!
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
